template<typename T>
_xvec4< T > glm::vectorCompMultGTX (const _xmat4< T > &x, const _xvec4< T > &y)
 Returns the result of the product between the transposed 4 * 4 matrix of x and the 4 component vector y. Deprecated, prefer vec4 * mat4 operator (From GLM_GTX_vector_comp_mult extension).
template<typename T>
